Title: Regulates commercial finance licensing, establishes the minority- and women-owned business protection program
Summary: Regulates commercial finance licensing; establishes the minority- and women-owned business protection program; makes conforming technical changes thereto.
LawCode: Ren Art 9-A to be Art 9-B, add Art 9-A §§363 - 363-o, amd §§22, 635 & 652-b, Bank L; amd §10-136, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to regulating commercial finance licensing, establishing the minority- and women-owned business protection program
